animeDescription: A TV series from Monkey Punch with a 1-hour premiere episode. Mankatsu will feature standard "Monkey characters" and ecchi-gags found in all Monkey Punch series.
animeRelated: ['Monkey Punch: Manga Katsudou Daishashin - Crime Mate Special']
